name: Chromatophobia (SokomantaGames)
description:
A submission to Mini Game Jam 111.

For ages untold, the magic campfire has been supplying this world with its colors, but its legend has created an army of adventurers ready to take its power.

As the campfire's protector, you must defend it long enough for its fire to cleanse this world. The fire has provided you part of its power, but beware, as it could drive you crazy.
